content.raw:
Note that even default is not building for Homebrew since it started [requiring](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/blob/master/ignition-gui0.rb#L24) ign-transport4. I believe even pull request #64 won't work until we have an ign-transport4 pre-release.

I think the options are:

1. Wait for an ign-transport4 release
1. Revert homebrew to accept ign-transport3
1. Deal with homebrew in a future PR, because strictly speaking, this PR is not breaking anything
content.html:
Note that even default is not building for Homebrew since it started requiring ign-transport4. I believe even pull request #64 won't work until we have an ign-transport4 pre-release.

I think the options are:

  1. Wait for an ign-transport4 release
  2. Revert homebrew to accept ign-transport3
  3. Deal with homebrew in a future PR, because strictly speaking, this PR is not breaking anything
